participant_1.background:
I remember my mom reading me books when I was little.
when i am not touring with the band , i like to garden.
i m 49 , male and live in dublin , ireland.
I'm always looking for ways to make my home cooking more exciting, and I love trying new recipes.
I enjoy a day of fishing on my viking boat.

participant_2.background:
I am proud of my ability to get a degree in two years despite my reputation as a slacker.
i wish i could live forever.
I like to visit running and football websites to keep up with the latest news.
I'm learning to swim and I'm doing my best.
I'm a big fan of classic comfort food, like macaroni and cheese.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing?
Hi there, I am doing well thank you!
Awesome to hear! I'm doing pretty well too, thanks for asking.
That's great to hear! Are you from Ireland?
Yes I am, born and raised in Dublin.
Oh cool, I've heard great things about Dublin! I've never been there before, but I'd love to visit someday.
It's a great city, you should definitely come visit! What are some of your interests?
I'm interested in a lot of things, but my main interests are running, football, and cooking.
Oh, that's awesome! I love running too. I'm not very good at it, but I enjoy it nonetheless.
I'm not very good at it either, but I keep practicing and getting better!
That's the spirit! I'm also a big fan of football. I love watching it and playing it.
Same here! I'm a big fan of the NFL. I'm also a big fan of cooking. I love trying new recipes and experimenting in the kitchen.
That's awesome! I love cooking too. I'm always looking for new ways to make my home cooking more exciting.
Me too! I love trying new recipes and seeing what I can come up with.
It sounds like we have a lot in common! What do you do for a living?
I'm a teacher. I teach math at a local high school.
Oh, that's cool! I've always thought about being a teacher.
It's a great job! I love working with kids and helping them learn.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're a great teacher.
Thanks! I try my best.
Well, it sounds like you're a pretty cool person!
Thanks! You seem pretty cool too
